Pre-Game Insights: Both India and Bangladesh have won two out of three matches in the T20 World Cup.
Bangladesh has managed to eke out wins against Zimbabwe and the Netherlands but will be keen to beat their neighbors.
India comes into the game on the back of a disappointing loss to South Africa.
Virat Kohli and Suryakumar Yadav have been standout performers for India with the bat.
Rohit Sharma and Co. will be wary of what Bangladesh are capable of doing.
Miscellaneous Highlights: A relatively high-scoring game is expected at the Adelaide Oval.
The pitch could be a touch on the slower side, affecting play.
The team batting first have won three out of five matches at the venue.
Dinesh Karthik's fitness is a concern for India.
Others: The match is the 35th game of the ICC Men's T20 World Cup 2022.
The game is set to take place at 1:30 PM IST.
The live score & commentary can be followed on Sportskeeda.
